 How to develop simple forecasts for time series forecasting problems that provide a baseline
for estimating model skill.
 How to develop autoregressive models for time series forecasting.
 How to develop exponential smoothing methods for time series forecasting.
5.6.1 Next
This is the ﬁnal lesson of this part, the next part will focus on how to develop deep learning
models for time series forecasting in general.
